memory._comment: Strings are immutable, so content are stored in chunks of strings to reduce lag.
memory.________: The more length a chunk is, it takes less memory, but more lag occurs.
memory._______: Reading files with the -d flag and writing files will be faster with high chunk sizes.

colors._comment: These colors are stored as strings because the JSON format doesn't support numbers in hexadecimal.
colors.________: If you would like to insert a number as decimal, remove the 0x prefix, but not the quotation marks.
